translations: 编纂；将...编成法典（codify 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: We have to make due with codifying how it works not why it does it.
sentences.translation: 我们必须加以编纂归类，分清它是怎样运作的，而不是为何如此运作。

sentences.sentence: A codifying statute involves the enactment of the whole law on a particular subject.
sentences.translation: 一部法典化的制定法包括包括所有关于某特定事项的法律规定。

sentences.sentence: Writing, in making the world light - in codifying, distorting, prettifying, verbalizing it - approaches blasphemy.
sentences.translation: 写作，使得世界变轻松- - -通过编纂、歪曲、粉饰、赞美它- - -几近亵渎。
